component.feedback: ***You must enter the exact and full command. Commands that include a name or password are case-sensitive.***
component.existingcommands:
Configure an extended VLAN on a Catalyst 2960 Plus switch as follows:
  • Enter Global Configuation mode on S1.
  • Set the VTP mode to transparent.
  • Create extended VLAN 2000
  • Exit Global Configuration mode using the end command.

command.deviceresponse: Setting device to VTP transparent mode for VLANS.

command.instruction: <font face="_sans"><b>Verify that the VLAN was created using the brief version of the show vlan command.</font>

command.deviceresponse:
VLAN Name Status Ports
---- -------------------------------- --------- -------------------------------
1 default active Fa0/3, Fa0/4, Fa0/5, Fa0/6
Fa0/7, Fa0/8, Fa0/9, Fa0/10
Fa0/11, Fa0/12, Fa0/13, Fa0/14
Fa0/15, Fa0/16, Fa0/17, Fa0/18
Fa0/19, Fa0/20, Fa0/21, Fa0/22
Fa0/23, Fa0/24, Gi0/1, Gi0/2
1002 fddi-default act/unsup
1003 token-ring-default act/unsup
1004 fddinet-default act/unsup
1005 trnet-default act/unsup
2000 VLAN2000 active
S1#
command.instruction: <font face="_sans"><b>You have successfully configured and verified Extended VLANs.</font>
